title: Architect designed house
details:
On a 9 perch land an architecture designed modern house 3000 sq ft with 4 bedrooms 5 bathrooms, pantry/dining (wooden floor) and kitchen. Wooden staircase. 1500 lt sump + overhead tank, solar hot water, pressure pump, two balconies and a rooftop with bar area. 9 ft parapet wall one roller shutter door and two wooden gates connected two roads. Nearly 4 perch garden with parking for two vehicles. On a clear sky you could see Siripada mountain range. One km to Malabe junction and one km to Malabe highway entrance. 3 minutes walking to a very popular fitness center + swimming pool and spa.

Rs 28 Million (Negotiable)
